title: Kayn in game rune change from Preditor to Electrocute
body: As the title says, I i choose runes with preditor rune in it, after the loading screen there will be a line of text in chat (white) that preditor was changed to electrocute. Wich implies that out of all champions Kayn is forbidden to use the Preditor rune. Would very much like to get the attention of a Riot employee so this bug could be fixed.

replies.body: Read the service stats, it's there for a reason.
They disabled predator on Kayn because of a bug. They've already stated it. You're not paying attention.
